name: Monolithworks
overview: Monolithworks is a corporate/commercial video production house based in San Francisco Bay Area, that specializes in storytelling film and video production for corporate and commercial clients. Monolithworks is one of the first production companies devoted to creating and developing social media and transmedia solutions with a focus on corporate film and video. A rapidly expanding audience both within and outside most corporations is relying increasingly on video, blogs, microblogs, social networks, media-sharing, discussion forums, and virtual worlds to communicate and collaborate. In fact, social and transmedia solutions that incorporate video have become key resources in the communication of corporate messaging. Monolithworks is the number one provider of this social media and video content.
